Maruti Swift Dzire.name: Maruti Swift Dzire
Maruti Swift Dzire.description: Enjoy an economical and thrilling drive in The Dazzling-New Dzire, India’s most Fuel-Efficiency sedan#. Keeping the essence of what makes the Dzire truly special, it boasts a fuel efficiency of 24.79* (in MT) and 33.73* km/kg (in MT) with S-CNG.

Hyundai Creta.name: Hyundai Creta
Hyundai Creta.description: The Hyundai Creta is a premium SUV that blends bold design, advanced features, and refined performance. With spacious interiors, cutting-edge technology, and exceptional ride comfort, it’s built to dominate both city roads and highways.

Tata Nexon.name: Tata Nexon
Tata Nexon.description: The Tata Nexon smart offers a premium experience with a powerful turbo-petrol engine and a smooth automatic gearbox.

Maruti Swift.name: Maruti Swift
Maruti Swift.description: The all-new Maruti Swift ZXI+ is a stylish, feature-loaded and fuel-efficient hatchback perfect for city driving.

KIA Syros.description: Base HTK variant with 12.3″ HD touchscreen, wireless Android Auto/Apple CarPlay, halogen headlamps, rear camera, and robust 20‑Hi safety package with 6 airbags and ADAS Level‑2 support.

Mahindra XUV700.name: Mahindra XUV700

Tata Altroz.name: Tata Altroz

Maruti Brezza.name: Maruti Brezza

Maruti Grand Vitara.name: Maruti Grand Vitara

Maruti Baleno.name: Maruti Baleno
Maruti Baleno.description: The Maruti Baleno is a premium hatchback offering a stylish design, efficient performance, and modern features.

Maruti XL6.name: Maruti XL6
Maruti XL6.description: The Maruti XL6 is a premium 6-seater MUV with bold styling, comfort features, and strong fuel efficiency.

Maruti Invicto.name: Maruti Invicto
Maruti Invicto.description: The Maruti Invicto offers spacious 7-seater comfort, premium interiors, and hybrid efficiency, making it ideal for large families.

Maruti Fronx.name: Maruti Fronx
Maruti Fronx.description: The Maruti Fronx is a stylish compact SUV with a bold design, efficient engines, and modern features for daily driving comfort.

Mahindra Thar.name: Mahindra Thar

Tata punch.name: Tata punch

Toyota Taisor.name: Toyota Taisor
Toyota Taisor.description: Base model with manual transmission and great efficiency.

Toyota Rumion.name: Toyota Rumion
Toyota Rumion.description: Base model with standard safety and infotainment features. Best for family usage.

Toyota Glanza.name: Toyota Glanza
Toyota Glanza.description: Base model with manual transmission and reliable performance.

Volkswagen Taigun.name: Volkswagen Taigun
Volkswagen Taigun.description: Base model with efficient engine and essential features.

Mahindra XEV 9e.description: Base model electric vehicle with 59 kWh battery and 542 km range.

Mahindra XUV400 EV.name: Mahindra XUV400 EV

MG Comet EV.name: MG Comet EV

Tata Tiago EV.name: Tata Tiago EV
Tata Tiago EV.description: Base model with 19.2 kWh battery, 250 km range, 60.34 bhp power, 2 months waiting.

Tata Tigor EV.name: Tata Tigor EV
Tata Tigor EV.description: Base model with 26 kWh battery, 315 km range, 73.75 bhp power, 2 months waiting.

Skoda Kushaq.description: Entry‑level Classic with 1.0 TSI petrol, 6‑speed manual, offering 19.76 kmpl.

Skoda Kodiaq.name: Skoda Kodiaq
Skoda Kodiaq.description: Entry-level variant with 2.0TSI turbo‑petrol engine (190PS, 320Nm), AWD, and sporty black styling.

Nissan Magnite.name: Nissan Magnite
Nissan Magnite.description: Base Visia trim with naturally aspirated 1.0 L petrol engine and 5‑speed manual gearbox.

Nissan X‑Trail.name: Nissan X‑Trail
Nissan X‑Trail.description: India‑spec X‑Trail launched as a CBU, powered by a 1.5 L three‑cylinder VC‑turbo petrol engine (161 PS/300 Nm) mated to shift‑by‑wire CVT with paddle shifters, featuring mild‑hybrid assistance and seven seats.

Tata Safari.name: Tata Safari
Tata Safari.description: Smart 7 STR variant with 1956 cc diesel engine, manual transmission, and 16.3 kmpl mileage.

MG Hector.name: MG Hector
MG Hector.description: Base petrol manual variant with standard features, steel wheels, halogen lamps and fabric seats.

MG Astor.name: MG Astor
MG Astor.description: Entry‑level petrol manual variant with fabric seats and standard features.

Mahindra Scorpio N.name: Mahindra Scorpio N
Mahindra Scorpio N.description: The Mahindra Scorpio N Z2 Petrol MT 7 STR (ESP) offers a bold SUV presence with powerful 200 bhp petrol engine and manual transmission, delivering a blend of performance and comfort.

Mahindra Bolero Neo.name: Mahindra Bolero Neo
Mahindra Bolero Neo.description: The Mahindra Bolero Neo N4 offers rugged design, 100 bhp diesel performance, and reliable manual transmission for everyday utility and comfort.

Mahindra XUV 3XO.name: Mahindra XUV 3XO
Mahindra XUV 3XO.description: The Mahindra XUV 3XO MX1 1.2 Petrol offers a refined petrol engine with manual transmission and excellent fuel efficiency of 18.89 kmpl.

Renault Kwid.name: Renault Kwid
Renault Kwid.description: Bare‑bones base model with LED DRLs, digital instrument cluster, heater, driver airbag, ABS.

Renault Kiger.name: Renault Kiger
Renault Kiger.description: Base petrol manual variant with LED DRLs, digital cluster, ABS, dual airbags.

Renault Triber.name: Renault Triber
Renault Triber.description: Facelift base variant now with 4‑power windows, central locking, projector headlamps.

Toyota Fortuner.name: Toyota Fortuner
Toyota Fortuner.description: Premium SUV with a powerful 2.7L petrol engine and automatic transmission, delivering 10.3 kmpl mileage.

Toyota Innova Crysta.name: Toyota Innova Crysta
Toyota Innova Crysta.description: Innova Crysta GX 7-seater with powerful 2.4L diesel engine and comfortable cabin.

Toyota Hilux.name: Toyota Hilux
Toyota Hilux.description: The rugged Hilux STD 4X4 MT is built for extreme durability, with a 2.8L diesel engine delivering excellent off-road capability.

Toyota Land Cruiser.name: Toyota Land Cruiser
Toyota Land Cruiser.description: The Toyota Land Cruiser ZX Diesel combines unmatched off-road prowess with luxurious interiors, powered by a 3.3L twin-turbo diesel engine delivering 304 bhp.

Toyota Innova Hycross.name: Toyota Innova Hycross
Toyota Innova Hycross.description: The Toyota Innova Hycross GX 7 STR offers a refined petrol engine with CVT automatic transmission, spacious seating for seven, and a mileage of 16.13 kmpl.

BYD Atto 3.name: BYD Atto 3
BYD Atto 3.description: BYD Atto 3 Dynamic is the entry variant with a 49.92 kWh Blade battery, 201 bhp motor, and ~345 km ARAI range. Launched at ₹24.99 L ex‑showroom India.

BYD Seal.name: BYD Seal
BYD Seal.description: BYD Seal Dynamic RWD with a 61.44 kWh Blade battery, approx. 201 bhp and 310 Nm, 0‑100 km/h in ~7.5 s, and ARAI‑claimed range of 510 km. Ex‑showroom ₹41 L in India. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

BYD Sealion 7.name: BYD Sealion 7
BYD Sealion 7.description: BYD Sealion 7 Premium is the rear‑drive electric SUV‑coupe with a 82.56 kWh battery, ~308 bhp / 380 Nm, 0‑100 km/h in ~4.5 s, ARAI‑claimed range ≈567 km. Launched in India at ₹48.90 L ex‑showroom. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

BYD eMAX 7.name: BYD eMAX 7
BYD eMAX 7.description: BYD eMAX 7 Premium 6‑seater variant with 55.4 kWh Blade battery, 161 bhp and 310 Nm, 0‑100 km/h in ~10.1 s, and ARAI‑claimed range of ~420 km. Ex‑showroom ₹26.90 L in India; on‑road Delhi around ₹31.2 L.

BYD eMAX 7.name: BYD eMAX 7
BYD eMAX 7.description: BYD eMax 7 Premium 7‑seater variant. 55.4 kWh battery, ~161 bhp and 310 Nm, 0‑100 km/h ~10 s, ARAI range ~420 km. Ex‑showroom ₹27.50 L in India, on‑road ~₹29.56 L in Delhi.

Toyota Fortuner Legender.name: Toyota Fortuner Legender
Toyota Fortuner Legender.description: Premium SUV variant with a powerful 2.8L diesel engine, automatic transmission, and advanced comfort features.

Kia Carens Clavis.name: Kia Carens Clavis
Kia Carens Clavis.description: Entry-level petrol variant offering a balance of comfort and affordability with Kia's signature design.

Kia Carens.name: Kia Carens
Kia Carens.description: The Kia Carens Premium (O) 1.5 Petrol 7 STR offers a perfect combination of comfort, style, and practicality with spacious seating for seven passengers, advanced features, and a refined petrol engine.

Kia Carens EV.name: Kia Carens EV
Kia Carens EV.description: The Carens Clavis EV HTK Plus comes with a 42 kWh battery, automatic transmission, and delivers smooth, eco-friendly performance for daily commutes and long drives.

Kia Carnival.name: Kia Carnival
Kia Carnival.description: The Carnival Limousine Plus offers luxury and spacious interiors, powered by a 2151 cc diesel engine paired with a smooth 8-speed automatic transmission.

Kia EV6.name: Kia EV6
Kia EV6.description: The Kia EV6 GT Line AWD delivers a thrilling electric performance with an impressive 663 km range, dual motor all-wheel-drive system, and advanced safety and comfort features.

Kia EV9.name: Kia EV9
Kia EV9.description: The Kia EV9 GT-Line AWD is a luxury all-electric SUV featuring a 99.8 kWh battery, advanced AWD system, premium comfort, and state-of-the-art technology for an exceptional driving experience.

MG M9 EV.name: MG M9 EV
MG M9 EV.description: The M9 EV Presidential Limo is a premium electric sedan designed for luxury and comfort, offering a 90 kWh battery, 548 km range, and top-tier interior features.

MG Gloster.name: MG Gloster
MG Gloster.description: Sharp variant with 7-seater configuration, 2.0L turbo diesel engine, and automatic transmission.

Gloster.name: Gloster
Gloster.description: Savvy variant with 7-seater layout, powerful 2.0L twin-turbo diesel engine, and 4WD capability.

Citroen C3.name: Citroen C3
Citroen C3.description: Experience the Citroen C3 Live 1.2 Petrol with a 1198 cc engine, delivering 80 bhp power and excellent fuel efficiency of 19.3 kmpl for an engaging city and highway drive.

Citroen Basalt.name: Citroen Basalt
Citroen Basalt.description: The Citroen Basalt You 1.2 Petrol MT offers 80 bhp performance with 18 kmpl mileage, combining efficiency and SUV comfort.

Citroen C3 Aircross.name: Citroen C3 Aircross
Citroen C3 Aircross.description: The Citroen C3 Aircross You 1.2 5 STR offers 80 bhp performance with 17.5 kmpl efficiency, perfect for family trips.

Citroen eC3.name: Citroen eC3
Citroen eC3.description: The Citroen eC3 Feel delivers an electric driving range of 320 km with a 29.2 kWh battery and smooth automatic transmission.

Citroen C5 Aircross.name: Citroen C5 Aircross
Citroen C5 Aircross.description: The Citroen C5 Aircross Shine Dual Tone offers a premium SUV experience with a powerful diesel engine, dual tone styling, and smooth automatic transmission.

Tata Curvv.name: Tata Curvv
Tata Curvv.description: The Tata Curvv Smart 1.2 Revotron Petrol 6MT offers a stylish SUV coupe design with a powerful 118 bhp petrol engine and manual transmission.

TATA Curvv EV.name: TATA Curvv EV
TATA Curvv EV.description: The Tata Curvv EV Creative 45 offers a 45 kWh battery delivering up to 430 km of range with modern SUV coupe styling.

Hyundai Venue.name: Hyundai Venue

Tata nexon ev.name: Tata nexon ev
Tata nexon ev.description: Experience electrifying performance and advanced features in the Tata Nexon EV Creative Plus Medium Range, offering a range of 325 km per charge and a premium driving experience.

Honda Elevate.description: The Honda Elevate SV MT offers a refined petrol engine with exceptional comfort, style, and efficiency, perfect for city drives and highway cruises.

Honda Amaze.name: Honda Amaze

Hyundai Exter.name: Hyundai Exter
Hyundai Exter.description: Base petrol manual variant with 82 bhp engine.

Exter.name: Exter
Exter.description: Smart variant with Hy-CNG manual transmission and dual fuel option.

Hyundai Grand i10 Nios.name: Hyundai Grand i10 Nios

Hyundai Verna.description: Base petrol manual variant of Hyundai Verna with efficient mileage.

Maruti Alto K10.description: Base petrol manual variant of Alto K10 with excellent fuel efficiency.

Maruti S-Presso.name: Maruti S-Presso
Maruti S-Presso.description: Base petrol manual variant of S-Presso with efficient mileage.

Mahindra Scorpio.name: Mahindra Scorpio
Mahindra Scorpio.description: Basic 7-seater Scorpio with diesel manual transmission.

KIA Sonet.name: KIA Sonet
KIA Sonet.description: Entry-level Sonet petrol manual variant with 82 bhp engine.

VINFAST VF 6.name: VINFAST VF 6

Vinfast VF 7.name: Vinfast VF 7
Vinfast VF 7.description: VinFast VF 7 Earth offers a 59.6 kWh battery, automatic transmission, and a certified range of 438 km.

Toyota Urban Cruiser Hyryder.name: Toyota Urban Cruiser Hyryder
Toyota Urban Cruiser Hyryder.description: NeoDrive E — 102 bhp petrol, 136.8 Nm torque, claimed 21.11 kmpl. On-road price from Rs. 13.66 Lakh .

Toyota Urban Cruiser Hyryder G.name: Toyota Urban Cruiser Hyryder G
Toyota Urban Cruiser Hyryder G.description: NeoDrive Aero Edition (G O) — aero styling for G(O) trim, 102 bhp and 21.11 kmpl. On-road price Rs. 17.68 Lakh.

Toyota Urban Cruiser Hyryder V.name: Toyota Urban Cruiser Hyryder V
Toyota Urban Cruiser Hyryder V.description: AT NeoDrive Dual Tone (V) — automatic with dual-tone finish, 102 bhp. On-road price Rs. 21.22 Lakh.

Mercedes-Benz c.name: Mercedes-Benz c
Mercedes-Benz c.description: Mercedes-Benz C-Class C 200 — 1496 cc mild-hybrid petrol engine producing 201 bhp. On-road price Rs. 68.76 Lakh.

Mercedes-Benz A.name: Mercedes-Benz A
Mercedes-Benz A.description: Mercedes-Benz A-Class Limousine 200 — 1332 cc petrol engine producing 161 bhp. On-road price Rs. 51.95 Lakh.

Mercedes-Benz G.name: Mercedes-Benz G
Mercedes-Benz G.description: The Mercedes-Benz G-Class is an iconic luxury off-road SUV with a 3.0-litre diesel engine producing 326 bhp and 700 Nm. Accelerates 0–100 kmph in 6.4 seconds and delivers exceptional off-road capability. On-road price: Rs. 3.49 Crore (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz GLA.name: Mercedes-Benz GLA

Mercedes-Benz GLS.name: Mercedes-Benz GLS
Mercedes-Benz GLS.description: Mercedes-Benz GLS 450 4MATIC — 2999 cc petrol engine delivering 375 bhp with TC automatic transmission. On-road price Rs. 1.57 Crore (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz E.name: Mercedes-Benz E
Mercedes-Benz E.description: Mercedes-Benz E-Class E200 LWB — 1999 cc petrol engine producing 201 bhp. On-road price Rs. 91.77 Lakh (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz Maybach.name: Mercedes-Benz Maybach
Mercedes-Benz Maybach.description: Mercedes-Maybach S 580 4MATIC — 3982 cc mild-hybrid V8 producing 496 bhp with AWD. Ultimate luxury limousine. On-road price Rs. 3.43 Crore (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz GLE.name: Mercedes-Benz GLE
Mercedes-Benz GLE.description: Mercedes-Benz GLE 300d AMG Line — 1993 cc diesel engine producing 265 bhp. On-road price Rs. 1.16 Crore (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz S-Class.name: Mercedes-Benz S-Class
Mercedes-Benz S-Class.description: Mercedes-Benz S-Class S 450 4MATIC — 2999 cc mild-hybrid petrol engine delivering 375 bhp with AWD. On-road price Rs. 2.13 Crore (Mumbai).

Mercedes - Benz Maybach.name: Mercedes - Benz Maybach
Mercedes - Benz Maybach.description: Mercedes-Maybach EQS SUV 680 — 122 kWh ultra-luxury electric SUV offering 600 km range. On-road price Rs. 2.52 Crore (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz EQE.name: Mercedes-Benz EQE
Mercedes-Benz EQE.description: Mercedes-Benz EQE SUV 500 4MATIC — 90.56 kWh luxury electric SUV with 550 km range and AWD capability. On-road price Rs. 1.47 Crore (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz AMG.name: Mercedes-Benz AMG
Mercedes-Benz AMG.description: Mercedes-Benz AMG EQS 53 4MATIC+ — 107.8 kWh high-performance electric sedan with 526 km range. On-road price Rs. 2.58 Crore (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz GT 63 s.name: Mercedes-Benz GT 63 s
Mercedes-Benz GT 63 s.description: Mercedes-Benz AMG GT 63 S 4MATIC+ Limousine — 3982 cc twin-turbo V8 producing 630 bhp with AWD. Ultra-high-performance luxury four-door coupe. On-road price Rs. 3.21 Crore (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz AMG S.name: Mercedes-Benz AMG S
Mercedes-Benz AMG S.description: Mercedes-Benz AMG S 63 E Performance — 3982 cc V8 plug-in hybrid producing 794 bhp. One of the most powerful AMG sedans ever built. On-road price Rs. 4.10 Crore (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz EQA.name: Mercedes-Benz EQA
Mercedes-Benz EQA.description: Mercedes-Benz EQA 250 Plus — 70.5 kWh electric SUV delivering 560 km range. On-road price Rs. 70.36 Lakh (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz EQB.name: Mercedes-Benz EQB
Mercedes-Benz EQB.description: Mercedes-Benz EQB 350 4MATIC — 66.5 kWh electric luxury SUV offering 423 km range with AWD capability. On-road price Rs. 82.39 Lakh (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz EQB Plus.name: Mercedes-Benz EQB Plus
Mercedes-Benz EQB Plus.description: Mercedes-Benz EQB 250 Plus — 70.5 kWh luxury electric SUV with spacious 7-seat configuration. On-road price Rs. 83.26 Lakh (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz AMG-S.name: Mercedes-Benz AMG-S
Mercedes-Benz AMG-S.description: Mercedes-Benz AMG A45 S 4MATIC+ — 1991 cc turbocharged petrol engine delivering 421 bhp. One of the most powerful hatchbacks in the world. On-road price Rs. 1.13 Crore (Mumbai).

Mercedes-Benz_AMG.name: Mercedes-Benz_AMG
Mercedes-Benz_AMG.description: Mercedes-Benz AMG E53 Cabriolet 4MATIC+ — 2999 cc turbocharged petrol engine with 429 bhp and AWD. A high-performance luxury convertible. On-road price Rs. 1.55 Crore (Mumbai).

Ferrari Purosangue.name: Ferrari Purosangue
Ferrari Purosangue.description: Ferrari Purosangue V12 — 6496 cc naturally aspirated V12 producing 715 bhp. Ferrari’s first four-door SUV with extreme performance. On-road price Rs. 11.74 Crore (Mumbai).

Ferrari GTB 3.0.name: Ferrari GTB 3.0
Ferrari GTB 3.0.description: Ferrari 296 GTB — 2992 cc twin-turbo V6 producing 645 bhp paired with DCT gearbox. A high-performance hybrid-ready supercar with Ferrari’s signature dynamics. On-road price Rs. 6.04 Crore (Mumbai).

Ferrari F8 Tributo.name: Ferrari F8 Tributo
Ferrari F8 Tributo.description: Ferrari F8 Tributo Berlinetta — 3902 cc twin-turbo V8 delivering 711 bhp with a 7.7 kmpl efficiency figure. One of Ferrari’s most celebrated mid-engine supercars. On-road price Rs. 4.77 Crore (Mumbai).

Ferrari Coupe.name: Ferrari Coupe
Ferrari Coupe.description: Ferrari Roma Coupe — 3855 cc twin-turbo V8 producing 612 bhp with a refined GT character. On-road price Rs. 4.46 Crore (Mumbai).

Ferrari Portofino.name: Ferrari Portofino
Ferrari Portofino.description: Ferrari Portofino M — 3855 cc twin-turbo V8 producing 591 bhp with a retractable hard-top convertible design. On-road price Rs. 4.16 Crore (Mumbai).

Ferrari GTS.name: Ferrari GTS
Ferrari GTS.description: Ferrari 296 GTS — 2992 cc twin-turbo V6 producing 663 bhp with a retractable hard-top GTS design. On-road price Rs. 6.98 Crore (Mumbai).

Volvo XC90.name: Volvo XC90
Volvo XC90.description: Volvo XC90 B5 Ultra — 1969 cc mild-hybrid petrol engine with 8-speed automatic transmission, AWD, offering luxury SUV comfort and typical real-world mileage of ~12.4 kmpl (ARAI figure).

Volvo EX30.name: Volvo EX30
Volvo EX30.description: Volvo EX30 RWD Ultra — fully electric compact SUV with 69 kWh battery, RWD, automatic transmission, delivering ~272 hp and a claimed range up to 480 km. A good fit for those seeking a premium-feel EV with compact dimensions.

Volvo XC60.name: Volvo XC60
Volvo XC60.description: Volvo XC60 B5 Ultra — 1969 cc mild-hybrid petrol engine (250 hp / 360 Nm) with 8-speed automatic, AWD, luxury SUV comfort and premium features.

Volvo EX40.name: Volvo EX40
Volvo EX40.description: Volvo EX40 Plus — fully electric compact-SUV with 69 kWh battery, RWD, automatic transmission, offering 238 hp / 420 Nm, with claimed driving range up to 475 km (WLTP).

Volvo EC40.name: Volvo EC40
Volvo EC40.description: Volvo EC40 E80 — fully electric AWD crossover with twin motors (408 bhp / 660 Nm), 78 kWh battery, automatic transmission, and a claimed range up to 530 km (WLTP). Great mix of performance, range and EV convenience.

Jeep Compass.name: Jeep Compass
Jeep Compass.description: Jeep Compass Sport 2.0 Diesel with the 1956 cc engine delivering 172 bhp and manual transmission.

Jeep Meridian.name: Jeep Meridian
Jeep Meridian.description: Meridian Longitude 4x2 MT uses a 1956 cc diesel engine delivering 168 bhp with a manual gearbox.

Jeep Wrangler.name: Jeep Wrangler
Jeep Wrangler.description: Jeep Wrangler Unlimited 2.0 Petrol — 1995 cc petrol engine, 268 bhp, Automatic (Torque Converter), ideal for both city commute and off-road adventures.

Jeep Grand Cherokee.name: Jeep Grand Cherokee
Jeep Grand Cherokee.description: Jeep Grand Cherokee Limited (O) 4x4 AT — 1995 cc petrol engine, 268 bhp, Automatic (Torque Converter), luxury SUV with full 4x4 capability.

Audi Q3.name: Audi Q3
Audi Q3.description: Audi Q3 40 TFSI Premium — 1984 cc petrol engine, 188 bhp, quick-shifting DCT and a balanced city-highway drive.

Audi A6.name: Audi A6
Audi A6.description: Audi A6 Premium Plus 45 TFSI — 1984 cc petrol, 261 bhp, smooth-shifting DCT and a refined, comfortable sedan experience.

Audi A4.name: Audi A4
Audi A4.description: Audi A4 Premium 40 TFSI — 201 bhp from a 1984 cc engine, quick DCT gearbox and a smooth, easy-to-live-with luxury sedan.

Audi Q7.name: Audi Q7
Audi Q7.description: Audi Q7 Premium Plus — 2995 cc turbo-petrol V6 with 335 bhp, smooth torque-converter automatic and a spacious 7-seater layout.

Audi S5 Sportback.name: Audi S5 Sportback
Audi S5 Sportback.description: Audi S5 Sportback with a 349 bhp turbo V6, Quattro AWD, sharp handling and a fastback silhouette.

Audi Q5.name: Audi Q5
Audi Q5.description: Audi Q5 Premium Plus with a 261 bhp 2.0 TFSI engine, DCT gearbox and a refined, comfortable cabin.

Audi A8 L.name: Audi A8 L
Audi A8 L.description: Audi A8 L Celebration Edition pairs a 344 bhp mild-hybrid V6 engine with a long-wheelbase luxury cabin.

Audi Q8.name: Audi Q8
Audi Q8.description: Audi Q8 55 TFSI quattro combines a 335 bhp 3.0-litre petrol engine with a spacious, tech-rich cabin and a 5-star safety rating.

Audi Q3 Sportback.name: Audi Q3 Sportback
Audi Q3 Sportback.description: Audi Q3 Sportback Signature Edition blends coupe-like styling with a 193 bhp turbo petrol motor and a 5-star safety rating.

Audi RS Q8 Performance.name: Audi RS Q8 Performance
Audi RS Q8 Performance.description: The Audi RS Q8 Performance packs a 648 bhp twin-turbo V8, quattro AWD and blistering performance. It holds the Nürburgring record for the fastest production SUV.

Audi RS5.description: Audi RS5 Sportback — 444 bhp 2.9-litre twin-turbo V6, Automatic (TC), sporty handling, premium sedan with 5-star safety rating.

Audi E-tron GT.description: Audi e-tron GT S — full-electric luxury sedan with 388 km driving range, high-tech cabin, and 5-star safety rating.

Audi E-tron Sportback.name: Audi E-tron Sportback
Audi E-tron Sportback.description: Audi e-tron Sportback 55 — all-electric SUV with 484 km driving range, 5-star safety rating, and a premium tech-loaded cabin.

Audi Q8 Sportback e-tron.name: Audi Q8 Sportback e-tron

BMW 3 Series.name: BMW 3 Series
BMW 3 Series.description: BMW 3 Series 50 Jahre Edition brings exclusive anniversary touches on top of the proven 330Li package.

BMW M4.name: BMW M4
